'use strict';
 
const BbPromise = require('bluebird');
const fse = require('fs-extra');
const path = require('path');
const _ = require('lodash ');
 
const deployCoreFile = require('./lib/deployCore');
 
class awsDeploy {
  constructor(serverless) {
    this.serverless = serverless;
    this.options = {};
    this.commands = {
      create: {
        usage: 'Deploy to AWS.',
        lifecycleEvents: [
          'awsdeploy',
        ],
      },
    };
    this.x = 'hooo';
 
    _.extend(this, deployCoreFile);
 
 
    this.hooks = {
      'awsdeploy:awsdeploy': (options) => {
        this.options = options;
 
        return BbPromise.bind(this)
          .then(this.deployCore)
          // .then(this.deployFunctions)
          // .then(this.compile)
          // .then(this.updateStack)
          // .then(this.finish);
      },
    };
  }
}
 
module.exports = awsDeploy;
